content.text: Match ends, Liverpool 2, Everton 1.
Second Half ends, Liverpool 2, Everton 1.
Attempt missed. Yannick Bolasie (Everton) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Cuco Martina.
Attempt missed. Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain (Liverpool) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Georginio Wijnaldum.
Foul by Jonjoe Kenny (Everton).
Georginio Wijnaldum (Liverpool) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Dominic Solanke (Liverpool) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Yannick Bolasie (Everton) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Dominic Solanke (Liverpool).
Substitution, Everton. Tom Davies replaces James McCarthy.
Goal!  Liverpool 2, Everton 1. Virgil van Dijk (Liverpool) header from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Liverpool. Conceded by Phil Jagielka.
Substitution, Everton. Oumar Niasse replaces Dominic Calvert-Lewin.
Attempt missed. Roberto Firmino (Liverpool) right footed shot from the left side of the box misses to the right following a set piece situation.
Dominic Solanke (Liverpool) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Cuco Martina (Everton).

Roberto Firmino (Liverpool) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Morgan Schneiderlin (Everton).
Substitution, Liverpool. Georginio Wijnaldum replaces Adam Lallana.
Goal!  Liverpool 1, Everton 1. Gylfi Sigurdsson (Everton) right footed shot from outside the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Phil Jagielka following a fast break.
Corner,  Liverpool. Conceded by Mason Holgate.
Attempt missed. Dominic Calvert-Lewin (Everton) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Jonjoe Kenny with a cross.
Attempt saved. Virgil van Dijk (Liverpool) header from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain with a cross.
Foul by Cuco Martina (Everton).

Offside, Liverpool. Roberto Firmino tries a through ball, but Joseph Gomez is caught offside.

Goal!  Liverpool 1, Everton 0. James Milner (Liverpool) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the centre of the goal.
